spree.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a short period of time when you do a lot of one activity, especially spending money or drinking alcohol
spree.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: They went on a drinking spree.
spree.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a short period of time during which someone spends a lot of money
spree.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Consumers went on a spending spree.
The company embarked on a takeover spree during the 1980s.
